name: jumpy cube 2
description:
So when I released the original jumpy cube, I texted my friends that I would give the person with the highest score by Friday 5 dollars. I did this thinking they wouldn't try to hard at it...

As it turns out, they started reaching the previous cap I had set for the high score... So I had no choice but to rebuild the game with a higher high score count and other QOL features.

Hope you enjoy and go touch some grass
